## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mibundleoperanditeratorbase">MIBundleOperandIteratorBase</a> - Iterator that visits all operands in a bundle of MachineInstrs.

This class is not intended to be used directly, use one of the sub-classes instead.

Intended use:

for (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mibundleoperands">MIBundleOperands</a> MIO(MI); MIO.isValid(); ++MIO) &#123; if (!MIO-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsinstprinter-cpp/#a85e8dc708ae90b1129b892cb8ae1500f">isReg()</a>) continue; ... &#125;

Definition at line 94 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
